name: Pikakid98 & SonicboomColt Classics
description:
A Collection Of Old Games Made By Pikakid98 And SonicboomColt

Pikakid98 & SonicboomColt Classics Is A Launcher Created By Pikakid98 To Launch Multiple Games. You Are Not Required To Use The Launcher However As You May Launch Any Game From Their Own Seperate Folder

The Legend Of Zelda: Sword Of Destiny
